data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Northern unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern, Ghana

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 2,003,200 people living in Northern, Ghana. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.section_summary: On average, 66 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Northern, Ghana.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Northern, Ghana.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Northern.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Chakali people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, cause the 518,649 believers in Northern to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Northern.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Northern, Ghana who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
